title.text: 1 Bed 1 Bath on Virgil in North Buffalo -Pets OK

content: 121 Virgil Ave. between Hertel and tacoma
-Bedroom has carpet and built in closet space
-Full bath has a tub and sink
Pet Friendly - allowed one cat or one dog per apartment, there are breed restrictions and must be under 50lbs. ($250 non-refundable pet fee)
Application with $25 application fee, we check credit, criminal background and monthly income. This is a 12 month lease. Non-smoking building.
If you are interested in moving in the next 30 days please contact me.
